name: Gaviscon Liquid Double Strength
description: Fast acting, soothing and lasts up to 4 hours. Suitable for use during pregnancy and breast-feeding. Relieves heartburn symptoms. Effective at treating symptoms associated with more severe and frequent heartburn i.e. a burning pain in the chest and mild acid regurgitation. Contains naturally derived sodium alginate which forms a protective layer over the stomach contents to help prevent acid coming back up into the oesophagus. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
